Contact Details: Author: Primary Care Domain, NHS Digital Responsible Statistician: Adam Langron Email enquiries@nhsdigital.nhs.uk  Telephone 0300 303 5678
Description: These are aggregated data on key health issues for people who are recorded by their GP as having a learning disability, and comparative data about a control group who are not recorded by their GP as having a learning disability.
Name: Health and Care of People with Learning Disabilities , Experimental Statistics: 2017 to 2018 [PAS]
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located on this landing page by locating the latest version of 'Health and Care of People with Learning Disabilities, Experimental Statistics, This may be located under Latest version or Previous  versions.  This will take you to a new landing page scroll down to Resources and the data can be found as a CSV file in a Zip file, the  Metadata is in a XLS spredsheet
Sizing Notes: Large table, simple structure and dimensions. Metadata in XLS file.
